aboutbrand: The trust is in the name. A home-grown startup, Fiducia - Powered by LeSol, engages with the brands to give identity to the products. A simple configurator enables you to put your brand to any product and start marketing from the word get-go.
bannerText: We strive to be your trusted electronics manufacturing services provider.Own product of global standard at competitive rates
copyright: Copyright Â© 2021 FIDUCIA. All Rights Reserved
ownership: From Design to Fulfilment We assume total responsibility and ownership from Design to Fulfilment to Reverse Logistics. Leave your headache to us and just market3 your brand.

designcard.heading: design
designcard.text: Use our superior product configurator to design the product you want your brand on.

samplingcard.heading: Sampling & Cost
samplingcard.text: Promptly get samples of product configured.

certificationcard.heading: Certification
certificationcard.text: Once you approve the samples, our team quickly gets to the job of certifications such as BIS, BEE, MNRE, UL, VDE, CE, etc of your product to ensure that it fully complies with the local law

productioncard.heading: Production
productioncard.text: Our production team will work alongside the certification team and undertake production immediately.

qualitycard.heading: Quaity Control
qualitycard.text: All our vendors and suppliers are onboarded after through check on quality and production capabilities. Be rest assured that our quality will be of global standards.
